subject: RE: [junit] Unit Testing an EJB
msgSnippet: ... Am I the only person who considers this really, really rude? Without knowing either the offender or the offendee, I would venture the guess that it was
messageBody:
> ** Replies from J. B. Rainsberger are unwelcome
> **

Am I the only person who considers this really, really rude?

Without knowing either the offender or the offendee, I would
venture the guess that it was said in jest, and taken as such...
